Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed (fired red); two added white bands; exterior: Z band between two bands; below, part of one ray; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0096) (phase 2)
